snippet: Oil’s jump lifted energy shares, and bank stocks rose, too, led by JP Morgan Chase’s 8 percent gain. Still, the market ended the week in the red.
abstract: Stocks rise, ending five-day losing streak on rising energy and financial shares.
lead_paragraph: Oil’s jump lifted energy shares, and bank stocks rose, too, led by JP Morgan Chase’s 8 percent gain. Still, the market ended the week in the red.

headline.main: Upbeat End to Grim Week as Oil Rises 12 Percent
headline.print_headline: Upbeat End to a Grim Week as Oil Rises 12 Percent
